description.zh-CN: 模態對話框組件，用於在集中的疊加界面中顯示重要信息或請求用戶操作。具有可自定義的內容、操作按鈕和背景交互處理，適用於引人注目的通知和用戶確認。
description.en-US: A modal dialog component for displaying important information or requesting user actions in a focused overlay interface. Features customizable content, action buttons, and backdrop interaction handling for attention-grabbing notifications and user confirmations.

description.zh-CN: 极简风格風格的模态对话框實現
description.en-US: A modern modal dialog implementation with clean styling, clear content hierarchy, smooth animations, and responsive behavior. Effectively presents modal content with intuitive interaction controls, clear action buttons, and professional appearance.

description.zh-CN: Material Design風格的模态对话框實現
description.en-US: Modal Dialog implementation in Material Design style
